value.message: Variable name 'err' is an arbitrary abbreviation; use 'error' for clarity.
value.suggestion: Rename 'err' to 'error' in all catch blocks and related references.

value.message: Access control error (missing EmailJS config) does not fail securely; function returns without error, potentially skipping security-critical email notifications.
value.suggestion: Throw an error or return a rejected promise when configuration is missing to ensure failure is explicit and secure.
